verses.verse: And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> took his <S%H5265>journey<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> he had, and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H884>Beer-sheba,<s%> and <S%H2076>offered<s%> <S%H2077>sacrifices<s%> unto the <S%H430>God<s%> of his <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac.<s%>

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> unto <S%H3478>Israel<s%> in the <S%H4759>visions<s%> of the <S%H3915>night,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob.<s%> And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2009>Here<s%> am I.

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H595>I<s%> am <S%H410>God,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of thy <S%H1>father:<s%> <S%H3372>fear<s%> <S%H408>not<s%> to go <S%H4480>down<s%> <S%H3381><s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> I will <S%H8033>there<s%> <S%H7760>make<s%> of thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> nation: <S%H1471><s%>

I <S%H595><s%> will go <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H5973>with<s%> thee into <S%H4714>Egypt;<s%> and <S%H595>I<s%> will <S%H1571>also<s%> surely bring thee <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5927><s%> again: and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> shall <S%H7896>put<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> thine <S%H5869>eyes.<s%>

And <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> from <S%H4480>Beer-sheba:<s%> <S%H884><s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>carried<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father,<s%> and their little <S%H2945>ones,<s%> and their <S%H802>wives,<s%> in the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> him.

And they <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> their <S%H4735>cattle,<s%> and their <S%H7399>goods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H7408>gotten<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him:

His <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> him, his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H2233>seed<s%> <S%H935>brought<s%> he <S%H854>with<s%> him into <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> and his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> <S%H7205>Reuben,<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1060>firstborn.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7205>Reuben;<s%> <S%H2585>Hanoch,<s%> and <S%H6396>Phallu,<s%> and <S%H2696>Hezron,<s%> and <S%H3756>Carmi.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8095>Simeon;<s%> <S%H3223>Jemuel,<s%> and <S%H3226>Jamin,<s%> and <S%H161>Ohad,<s%> and <S%H3199>Jachin,<s%> and <S%H6714>Zohar,<s%> and <S%H7586>Shaul<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a Canaanitish <S%H3669>woman.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi;<s%> <S%H1648>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah;<s%> <S%H6147>Er,<s%> and <S%H209>Onan,<s%> and <S%H7956>Shelah,<s%> and <S%H6557>Pharez,<s%> and <S%H2226>Zerah:<s%> but <S%H6147>Er<s%> and <S%H209>Onan<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan.<s%> And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6557>Pharez<s%> <S%H1961>were<s%> <S%H2696>Hezron<s%> and <S%H2538>Hamul.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3485>Issachar;<s%> <S%H8439>Tola,<s%> and <S%H6312>Phuvah,<s%> and <S%H3102>Job,<s%> and <S%H8110>Shimron.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2074>Zebulun;<s%> <S%H5624>Sered,<s%> and <S%H356>Elon,<s%> and <S%H3177>Jahleel.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> be the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3812>Leah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> in <S%H6307>Padan-aram,<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter<s%> <S%H1783>Dinah:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and his <S%H1323>daughters<s%> were <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H7969>three.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1410>Gad;<s%> <S%H6837>Ziphion,<s%> and <S%H2291>Haggi,<s%> <S%H7764>Shuni,<s%> and <S%H675>Ezbon,<s%> <S%H6179>Eri,<s%> and <S%H722>Arodi,<s%> and <S%H692>Areli.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H836>Asher;<s%> <S%H3232>Jimnah,<s%> and <S%H3438>Ishuah,<s%> and <S%H3440>Isui,<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah,<s%> and <S%H8294>Serah<s%> their <S%H269>sister:<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1283>Beriah;<s%> <S%H2268>Heber,<s%> and <S%H4439>Malchiel.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2153>Zilpah,<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to <S%H3812>Leah<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> <S%H853>and<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> she <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> even <S%H8337>sixteen<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H5315>souls.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H802>wife;<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> and <S%H1144>Benjamin.<s%>

And unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> and <S%H669>Ephraim,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H621>Asenath<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H6319>Poti-pherah<s%> <S%H3548>priest<s%> of <S%H204>On<s%> <S%H3205>bore<s%> unto him.

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> were <S%H1106>Belah,<s%> and <S%H1071>Becher,<s%> and <S%H788>Ashbel,<s%> <S%H1617>Gera,<s%> and <S%H5283>Naaman,<s%> <S%H278>Ehi,<s%> and <S%H7220>Rosh,<s%> <S%H4649>Muppim,<s%> and <S%H2650>Huppim,<s%> and <S%H714>Ard.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7354>Rachel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> to <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H702>fourteen.<s%> <S%H6240><s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1835>Dan;<s%> <S%H2366>Hushim.<s%>
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5321>Naphtali;<s%> <S%H3183>Jahzeel,<s%> and <S%H1476>Guni,<s%> and <S%H3337>Jezer,<s%> and <S%H8006>Shillem.<s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1090>Bilhah,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3837>Laban<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> unto <S%H7354>Rachel<s%> his <S%H1323>daughter,<s%> and she <S%H3205>bore<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H428>these<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H7651>seven.<s%>

All <S%H3605><s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> that <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> which came <S%H3318>out<s%> of his <S%H3409>loins,<s%> <S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> <S%H3290>Jacob's<s%> <S%H1121>sons'<s%> <S%H802>wives,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> were <S%H8346>threescore<s%> and <S%H8337>six;<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were <S%H3205>born<s%> him in <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> were <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H5315>souls:<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5315>souls<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob,<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> were threescore and <S%H7657>ten.<s%>

And he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> him <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> to <S%H3384>direct<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> unto <S%H1657>Goshen;<s%> and they <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made <S%H631>ready<s%> his <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> and went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H1>father,<s%> to <S%H1657>Goshen,<s%> and presented <S%H7200>himself<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him; and he <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6677>neck,<s%> and <S%H1058>wept<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> his <S%H6677>neck<s%> a good <S%H5750>while.<s%>

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> <S%H6471>Now<s%> let me <S%H4191>die,<s%> <S%H310>since<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> thy <S%H6440>face,<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> thou art <S%H5750>yet<s%> <S%H2416>alive.<s%>

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and <S%H413>unto<s%> his <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> I will go <S%H5927>up,<s%> and <S%H5046>show<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, My <S%H251>brethren,<s%> and my <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan,<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> me;

And the <S%H376>men<s%> are <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> <S%H6629><s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> their <S%H376>trade<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> to feed <S%H4735>cattle;<s%> and they have <S%H935>brought<s%> their <S%H6629>flocks,<s%> and their <S%H1241>herds,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> they have.
And it shall come to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> shall <S%H7121>call<s%> you, and shall <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> is your <S%H4639>occupation?<s%>

That ye shall <S%H559>say,<s%> Thy <S%H5650>servants'<s%> <S%H376>trade<s%> hath <S%H1961>been<s%> about <S%H4735>cattle<s%> from our <S%H4480>youth<s%> <S%H5271><s%> even <S%H5704>until<s%> <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H1571>both<s%> <S%H587>we,<s%> and <S%H1571>also<s%> our <S%H1>fathers:<s%> <S%H5668>that<s%> ye may <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%> <S%H6629><s%> is an <S%H8441>abomination<s%> unto the <S%H4714>Egyptians.<s%>
